title: Chelsea 2-1 West Ham: What Were The Main Talking Points As The Blues Mount A Comeback At Stamford Bridge?
description: Mounting a dramatic comeback at Stamford Bridge on Monday night, Chelsea secured just a second Premier League victory of 2025 as they claimed a 2-1 victory against West Ham. While Enzo Maresca’s men might have found a route back into the Champions League spots, they got off to a nightmare start in west London as […] The post Chelsea 2-1 West Ham: What Were The Main Talking Points As The Blues Mount A Comeback At Stamford Bridge? appeared first on Soccer News.
author: Tom Dunstan

title: Chelsea 2-1 West Ham: Own goal denies Potter point on Stamford Bridge return
description: Chelsea moved into the Premier League’s top four after coming from behind to beat West Ham 2-1 at Stamford Bridge. Aaron Wan-Bissaka’s 74th-minute own goal proved decisive, as he inadvertently turned Cole Palmer’s cross over Alphonse Areola with his attempted clearance.
